title: Enzo Maresca - Wikipedia
snippet: Enzo Maresca (born 10 February 1980) is an Italian professional football manager and former player. He is the head coach of Premier League club Chelsea. After starting out at West Bromwich Albion in 1998, he went on to play for several clubs in his country, including Juventus, who loaned him ...

title: Enzo Maresca Manager Profile, Record & Stats | Premier League
snippet: Enzo Maresca was appointed Chelsea head coach on 3 June 2024, replacing Mauricio Pochettino.

title: Enzo Maresca - Manager profile | Transfermarkt
snippet: This is the profile site of the manager Enzo Maresca. The site lists all clubs he coached and all clubs he played for.

title: Enzo Maresca | Profile | Official Site | Chelsea Football Club
snippet: Enzo Maresca began his new role on 1 July 2024 on a five-year contract, with a club option of a further year.
